Ingredients.1: 1 (3 ounce) package chicken flavored ramen noodles

Directions.1: Break up noodles and place in a microwave safe bowl. Add water and frozen veggie mix. Microwave on high 7 minutes.

Directions.2: Meanwhile whisk egg, mayonnaise, and season packet from the instant ramen together in a large bowl.

Directions.3: Temper egg mixture by ladling 1/4 cup of the boiling water from the noodles, whisking until combined. Ladle another 1/4 cup of the boiling water whisking until egg is cooked and completely incorporated.

Directions.4: Add remaining liquid and the noodles. Let sit until the noodles have absorbed the majority of the liquid, about 3 minutes.

Directions.5: Ladle into 2 serving bowls and serve immediately.
